articles.author: Manasi Pathak
articles.title: Criticism mounts over Manchester United’s handling of Mason Greenwood case - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Fans, women’s groups and ex-players slam the way Man Utd conducted an investigation into allegations against the player.
articles.content: Premier League club Manchester United has come under mounting criticism by womens support groups, fans and media for their handling of the Mason Greenwood case, with one fan group describing it as sh… [+7000 chars]
